definition: "The Hunt for Red October", a novel by Tom Clancy
pinyin: Lie4 sha1 Hong2 se4 Shi2 yue4 hao4

definition: red tourism, focused on sites in China associated with the Communist Revolution

sentences.english: The deposit insurance fund fell into the red in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 存款保險資金在2009年進入紅色警戒區。

sentences.english: Some of your red blood cells are deviating from this pattern.
sentences.chinese: 一些你的紅色血球正在脫離這一個典型。

sentences.english: Red back home, light fire make life.
sentences.chinese: 紅色跟着回家，人間煙火。
大家都不喜歡看到紅色。

sentences.english: This tree bears a hard red fruit.
sentences.chinese: 這樹結一種紅色的堅果。

sentences.english: Ted painted the town’s net red.
sentences.chinese: 泰德把城鎮的網塗成了紅色。

sentences.english: This cue is made from Birdseye Maple and blood-red- colored wood.
sentences.chinese: 本杆的木材爲鳥眼楓木與這種血紅色木材。

sentences.english: His sunken cheeks slowly reddened and burned with miserable shame.
sentences.chinese: 他羞愧萬分，凹陷的面頰上慢慢地透出了紅色。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing was that there are two red bridal sedan chairs in the front door.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的是，在前門有兩個紅色的新娘花轎。

sentences.english: To definite the optimum experimental condition for microwave extraction red pigment of Baubinia blakeana Dunn flower .
sentences.chinese: 確定微波萃取紅花羊蹄甲花紅色素的最佳試驗條件。

sentences.english: Danyun (Red-Cloud) Valley, a name which compares the red leaves to red clouds.
sentences.chinese: 丹雲峽，把成片的紅葉比作紅色的雲彩。

sentences.english: Found Red garments have two different thread color.
sentences.chinese: 發現紅色成品有兩種不同線色。

sentences.english: Bright dark cherry red colour with brick- red hints.
sentences.chinese: 略帶磚紅色的明亮深櫻桃紅。

sentences.english: This one was heart-shaped all satiny red with a pink bow on top.
sentences.chinese: 就像一隻粉紅色的蝴蝶停在一朵深紅的玫瑰上面。

sentences.english: The red marks of the wings and tail's projections are the characteristics of spangle .
sentences.chinese: 黑鳳蝶的特點是紅色的花紋和翅膀後邊兒有突起。

sentences.english: Geogre is not going to paint it pink.
sentences.chinese: 喬治不打算把它刷成粉紅色。
